game_description: Take to the skies in VR in this arcade air combat game. Test your skills against real players or the AI. Earn money by playing the game to unlock more powerful and deadly aircraft.
review_3: I love this game, especially Air Brigade 2. Please update Air Brigade 2 to reflect the scenery of Air Brigade 1.
review_4: I have no issue with motion sickness at all and have played vr for 2 year. Had to stop after 5 minutes of this. Controls bad, view bad. I know is in development but I'm going to ask for a refund
review_5: I’ve been playing flight sims for almost 30 yrs now. All the way back to F-15, on a floppy disc on a Tandy computer, and Chuck Yeager on a 386. I’ve been waiting for the day when VR was good enough for enjoyable flying experiences. It is now! I’m really enjoying this game. The textures could be a little nicer, but at this stage, it’s still really good, and I know it’s only gonna get better. Love the flight characteristics, very quick and smooth response. I was instantly immersed in the experience. Even had that butterfly stomach on some of the aerobatics. Great job and Thank You to all the people who developed this one!
